titleStmt.title: Epictetus junior, or, Maximes of modern morality in two centuries / collected by J.D. of Kidwelly.
Maximes. English
titleStmt.author: La Rochefoucauld, François, duc de, 1613-1680.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Franco̧is La Rochefoucauld. Cf. Wing (2nd ed.).
